TopicTitle: What Are Things You've Heard That Made You Facepalm?

Articles.Content:
diana-was-still-alive-hours-before-she-died.jpg

No. It's not real. It can't be real. It has to be a parody.

It's like the "Generalissimo Francisco Franco is still dead" reports.

Right?

I thought about posting my facepalm experience from a university class, but as is very common in this thread, it involved religious views...

It was a biochemisty or molecular biology or somthing like that class, talking about constructing phylogenetic trees based on sequence data... needless to say, a religiously motivated question was asked in the middle... and yes, the logic behind it was appalling.

Sorry folks, but this thread seems to bring out, in too many people, religious discussion and some disrespectful discussion of people's beliefs, which are against our forum rules.

Closed.
